## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G06420](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G06420)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AtC3H51</u>
- **Gene Name:** 
- **Description:**   Zinc finger (CCCH-type/C3HC4-type RING finger) family protein;(source:Araport11)
